content.question: Based on Figure 1, which of the following environmental changes will result in the greatest increase in the net photosynthetic productivity by the algae?

choices.label: A change in light intensity from <math alttext="0 micromoles per square meter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mtext>0 μmol·m</mtext><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mtext>·s</mtext><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math> to <math alttext="30 micromoles per square meter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.30em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">μ</mi><msup><mtext>mol·m</mtext><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mtext>·s</mtext><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
